type.title: Uniform
type.description: A random number following a uniform distribution between two values (inclusive).

min.title: Min
min.description: A number provider. The minimum value.

max.title: Max
max.description: A number provider. The maximum value.

type.title: Binomial
type.description: A random number following a binomial distrbution.

n.title: N
n.description: Number provider. The amount of trials.

p.title: P
p.description: Number provider. The probability of success on an individual trial.

type.title: Score
type.description: To query and use a scoreboard value.

target.title: Target
target.description: To choose with player name or entity UUID to query.

type.title: Type
type.description: Set to 'fixed' to manually specify a player name or UUID. Set to 'context' to use an entity from loot context.

name.title: Name
name.description: Specifies the name of the player, or the entity's UUID (in hypenated hexadecimal format) whose score to query.

target.title: Target
target.description: Specifies an entity from loot context to query the score of.

score.title: Score
score.description: The scoreboard objective to query on the selected player name or UUID.

scale.title: Scale
scale.description: Optional. Scale to multiply the score before returning it.
